docs.text: " my name is jack carter , and you don't want to know me " says our brooding anti-hero ( sylvester stallone ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: take his advice !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to know this guy is as rewarding as being thrown over a terrace .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and to watch this film is almost as painful .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " get carter " is a gloomy looking , unimaginative film that offers no joy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jack carter is as tough as tough guys come .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he works out of vegas as a self-described 'financial adjuster' .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: explaining his duties , he says , " people make promises and break them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i help them remember . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he has a chiseled body full of tattoos .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he has the weathered look indicative of a man who has seen his share of hard times .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he speaks in a hushed but menacing tone of voice .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in other words , this is sylvester stallone acting like . . . sylvester
docs.label: negative

docs.text: stallone .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and like most of his previous roles , his character is a shallow , one-dimensional thug whose modus operandi is to talk tough , hassle a few hapless people , find out what he needs to know , and then dispense his own kind of justice .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with the charisma of a pit bull , being tough is all that jack carter knows .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yet , even tough guys know when to put family first .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as the story begins , we learn that jack's little brother has died in a car accident .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the police attribute it to heavy drinking .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , jack is suspicious , believing that he was 'taken out' .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he takes a break from his vegas duties and tries to see if he can find the truth .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as he pokes around , he runs into several lowlife characters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they include a shady business partner , a prostitute , a dweebish millionaire molded after bill gates , and an oily owner of a porn website .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: any one of them may know something about his brother's death .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: all of them have the means of carrying out the deed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but don't expect an exercise in sleuthing where well-placed clues lead carter to the truth .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's all brawn and no brains , so there are no epiphanies during his investigation .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: instead , he uses intimidation to muscle his way forward , cycling through this circle of suspects .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: flustered with his lack of progress , he cycles through them again and again .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this all gets tiring fairly quickly .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: by the time the film launches into its final act , we're numb from its pedestrian pace .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oddly , as a tough-guy thriller , it starves us for action .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: admittedly , there is one nifty chase sequence , but this is related to a tangential and needless plot ( carter's vegas ties send thugs to retrieve him ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story also fails to generate any kind of emotion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: stallone has the personality of a slab of stone .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and the look and feel of the film is perpetually downcast .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the weather is constantly overcast or rainy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: meanwhile , most shots take place at night , in dimly lit rooms , or in dark alleys .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's just impossible to get stirred about that kind of atmosphere .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as a result , " get carter " amounts to nothing more than a flat thriller , bereft of clever moments and devoid of any excitement .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you're better off leaving this guy alone .
docs.label: negative
